amplifyNFTGame.title: Amplify your NFT game affordably
amplifyNFTGame.description: No more worrying about excess fees. We have the most cost-effective structure for your NFTs, from minting to distributing.

lowCostMint.title: Super Low Cost-to-mint
lowCostMint.description: AssetMantle offers you the fastest and most affordable NFT ecosystem. No additional fees. No needless middlemen. Own your stores and your NFTs with confidence and ease. We also have the lowest minting fees. Wanna bet your favorite celebrity’s first ever tweet on it?
lowCostMint.details: The best rate in the market

lowestTransactionCosts.title: Lowest Transaction costs across networks
lowestTransactionCosts.description: There are two parts to NFT costs. The first is setting up.  The second is transaction costs. The latter is where you can end up paying a lot more than you need to. With AssetMantle, we keep transaction costs to a minimum. And we’ve been doing that across networks for years.

jumpRightIn.title: This works, let’s jump right in!
jumpRightIn.description: That’s great. Let’s take you through store creation and ace your NFT game.

getPaid.title: But wait, how do I get paid?
getPaid.description: We’re glad you asked. We’ve got you covered.
list: AssetMantle will levy a nominal royalty fee which will go into a community pool
